definition: handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Ru handed down less than one hundred works, so very precious.
sentences.chinese: 汝窯傳世作品不足百件，因此非常珍貴。

sentences.english: For handed down your porcelain rare high-quality goods.
sentences.chinese: 爲傳世汝瓷罕見之精品。

sentences.english: Yue Fu Yuan white, handed down the long poems.
sentences.chinese: 樂府元白體，詩文傳世長。

sentences.english: Thangka handed down mostly works of Tibetan Buddhism and Bon.
sentences.chinese: 傳世唐卡大都是藏傳佛教和苯教作品。

sentences.english: His "Analects" is thousands of years, the masterpieces of our times.
sentences.chinese: 他的《論語》是千百年來的傳世之作。

sentences.english: Maecenas himself wrote both prose and verse, but only fragments survive.
sentences.chinese: 梅塞納斯自己也寫散文與詩歌，但僅有斷片傳世。

sentences.english: Penta- Bull plans, Chinese paintings handed down one of the top 10.
sentences.chinese: 五牛圖，中國十大傳世名畫之一。

sentences.english: The tao-te handed down for the first Taoist books.
sentences.chinese: 《道德經》爲道教始祖老子唯一傳世的著作。

sentences.english: The band from Hannover, Germany has many classic hits.
sentences.chinese: 這支來自德國漢諾威的樂隊有着多首傳世經典之作。

sentences.english: Is currently the only recognized worldwide tang handed down only existing copy of seeing painting.
sentences.chinese: 是目前全世界範圍內唯一認定的唐代仕女畫傳世孤本。

sentences.english: The authentic copies of Wang Hsi-chih's calligraphy are no longer available now.
sentences.chinese: 王羲之已經沒有真跡傳世了，現在傳世的都是鉤填本。

sentences.english: The authentic copies of Wang Hsi-chih's calligraphy are no longer available now.
sentences.chinese: 王羲之已經沒有真跡傳世了，現在傳世的都是鉤填本。

sentences.english: Literature handed down through thousands of years of wind and rain vicissitudes of life, which includes many corruption.
sentences.chinese: 傳世文獻經過幾千年的風雨滄桑，其中包含許多訛誤。

sentences.english: The literary and art works that can last forever all give equal emphasis to emotion and meaning with each supporting the other.
sentences.chinese: 中外傳世經典文學藝術作品都是情意互證兩不偏廢的。

sentences.english: Rhapsody On Wucheng is a highly praised famous piece among Bao Zhao's works handed down to posterity.
sentences.chinese: 《蕪城賦》是鮑照傳世作品中受人稱頌的賦作名篇。

sentences.english: I'll chcontinually being ange! I promise.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道新開傳世我會改的，我保證。

definition: authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
